alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Howard; Randolph (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 8:25PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Randolph County in north central Missouri... Howard County in central Missouri... Cooper County in central Missouri... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 825 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Huntsville to near Fayette to near Pilot Grove to near Otterville, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moberly, Boonville, Fayette, Huntsville, New Franklin, Pilot Grove, Higbee, Otterville, Bunceton, Clark, Cairo, Armstrong, Prairie Home, Renick, Jacksonville, Franklin, Wooldridge and Lamine. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 94 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
